editionStmt.p: The initial version of this file was created from data kindly provided by the Ethiopic Manuscript Imaging Project directed by Steve Delamarter.

publicationStmt.publisher: Die Schriftkultur des christlichen Äthiopiens und Eritreas: Eine multimediale Forschungsumgebung / Beta maṣāḥǝft

licence.p: This file is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0.

msContents.summary: Excerpt from the Missal, prayer of thanksgiving (f); Image of the Savior of the World, መልክአ፡ መድኃኔ፡ ዓለም፡, incomplete at the beginning (f-4v); Concluding excerpt of Mystagogia, ትምህርተ፡ ኅቡዓት፡ (); Image of Jesus Christ, መልክአ፡ ኢየሱስ፡ (Chaîne, Répertoire 25) (f-11r); Image of Jesus Christ, መልክአ፡ ኢየሱስ፡ (Chaîne, Répertoire 376) (f-12v, continued on f-34v); Image of Communion, መልክአ፡ ቍርባን፡ (Chaîne, Répertoire 17) (f-14v, incomplete at the end); Excerpt of Image of the Savior of the World, መልክአ፡ መድኃኔ፡ ዓለም፡ (f-17v); Mystagogia, Tǝmhǝrtä Ḫǝbu‘at, ትምህርተ፡ ኅቡዓት፡ (f-21r, the quire, in a different hand, is added later); Wisest of the Wise, Ṭäbibä Ṭäbiban, ጠቢበ፡ ጠቢባን፡ (f-23v, the quire, in a different hand, is added later); Prayer, “For the sake of the peaceful holy things,”Bä’ǝntä Qǝdsat., በእንተ፡ ቅድሳት፡ ሰላማዊት፡ (upper margins of f-28r); Prayer Against the Tongue of People, here called Prayer to Jesus Christ (Chaîne, Répertoire 314) (f-41r); Image of the Journey to Heaven, መንገደ፡ ሰማይ፡ (f-51v); Image of the Trinity, መልክአ፡ ሥላሴ፡, incomplete at the end (Chaîne, Répertoire 347) (f-58v); Image of Gäbrä Mänfas Qəddus, መልክአ፡ ገብረ፡ መንፈስ፡ ቅዱስ፡ (Chaîne, Répertoire, 162) (f-65v); Hymn to Gäbrä Mänfas Qəddus, “Greeting to you, Gäbrä Mänfas Qəddus, the Righteous,” ሰላም: ለከ: ገብረ: መንፈስ: ቅዱስ: ጻድቅ: ሰረገላከ: መብረቅ: (Chaîne, Répertoire 80) (f-66r); Image of Gabriel, መልክአ፡ ገብርኤል፡ (Chaîne, Répertoire 156) (f-71v); Image of the Miracles of Ewosṭatewos, መልክአ፡ ተአምረ: ኤዎስጣቴዎስ። (Chaîne, Répertoire 333) (f-73v);Image of Ewosṭatewos, መልክአ፡ ኤዎስጣቴዎስ።, incipit, እንዘ: ሀሎኩ: በተሰዶ: (Chaîne, Répertoire 353) (f-76v); Image of the Four Creatures, መልክአ፡ አርባዕቱ፡ እንስሳ። (no Chaîne, Répertoire number), incipit, ሰላም: ለዝክረ: ስምክሙ: ግሩም: ለጸውዖ:(f-80v); Image of Mary, መልክአ፡ ማርያም፡ (Chaîne, Répertoire 218) incipit: ሰላም: ሰላም: ለኲሎን: መልክእኪ: (f-84v); Image of the Covenant of Mercy, መልክአ፡ ኪዳነ፡ ምሕረት፡ (no Chaîne, Répertoire, number) incipit, ሰላም: ሰላም: ለዝክረ: ስምኪ: ጥዑም: (f-88r); Image of Mary of Qwəsqwam, መልክአ፡ ቍስቋም፡ (Chaîne Répertoire 175) (f-91r); Hymn to Mary, “The sound of your cry, Mary, echos in my consciousness,” incipit: ቀርነ: ብካይኪ: ማርያም: በርእሰ: ሕሊናየ: ደምፀ: (Chaîne, Répertoire 236) (f-95v); Image of the Icon, መልክዐ፡ ሥዕል፡ (Chaîne, Répertoire 368) (f-97v); Image of Mary of Edom. መልክአ፡ ኤዶም፡ (Chaîne, Répertoire 221) (f-100v); Hymn to Mary, “Rejoice, Mary, virgin in body and mind, ተፈሥሒ፡ ማርያም፡ ድንግልተ፡ ሥጋ፡ ወሕሊና፡ (Chaîne, Répertoire 303) (f-102v); Image of Joakim and Anna, መልክአ: ኢያቄም: ወሐና: (Chaîne, Répertoire 258) (f-110v); Hymn to Anna, Mother of Mary, “Greeting to you, sweet of memory and name,” ሰላም: ለኪ: ጥዕም ዝክር: ወስም: (no Chaîne, Répertoire, number) (f-111r); Image of Arägawi Zä-Mika’el, መልክዐ፡ አረጋዊ፡ ዘሚካኤል፡ (no Chaîne, Répertoire number) incipit, እምድኅረ: ብዙኃን ቀደምት: እለ: ወጠኑ: (f-114v); Hymn to Aragawi, “Rock of the Gospel, planted, and tabernacle of light, bright,” (no Chaîne, Répertoire number) (f-115v); Image of Garima, መልክአ፡ ገሪማ: (Chaîne, Répertoire 200) (f-121v); Hymn to Garima, “Blessedness for you, Garima,” ብፅዓን: ለከ: ገሪማ: (no Chaîne, Répertoire, number) (f-122v); Image of Täklä Haymanot, መልክአ፡ ተክለ፡ ሃይማኖት፡ (Chaîne, Répertoire 211) (f-130r); Hymn to Täklä Haymanot, “Greeting to you, Your Peace Discovers Us, ሰላም: ለከ: ትርከበነ: ሰላምከ: (no Chaîne, Répertoire, number) (f); Image of Ewosṭatewos, መልክአ፡ ኤዎስጣቴዎስ። (Chaîne, Répertoire 237) incipit, ቀዳሚሁሰ: ለዘ: የአምን: በረድኤትከ: ኃይል: (f-138v); Image of Samuel, መልክአ፡ ሳሙኤል: (Chaîne, Répertoire 322) incipit, አኅዝኩ: አንሰ: ለልብየ: እምሐኬቱ: (f-142v); Image of Afqäränä Ǝgzi’, መልክአ: አፍቀረነ: እግዚእ:, no Chaîne, Répertoire, number. Incipit, በስመ: አካለ: አብ: ልብ: ወበስመ: አካለ: ወልድ: ቃል: (f-147r); Hymn to Afqäränä Ǝgzi’, “Greeting to you, Afqäränä Ǝgzi’, Pillar of the Church” ሰላም ለከ: አፍቀረነ: እግዚእ: በለዝ: (no Chaîne, Répertoire, number) (f-148r); Image of Minas, መልክአ: ሚናስ: (Chaîne, Répertoire 367) incipit, ኦ: ማርያም: ወለተ: ይሁዳ: ወሌዊ, (f-151r); Hymn to Minas, “Greeting to you, Minas, the Chosen,” ሰላም: ለከ: ኅሩይ: ሚናስ (no Chaîne, Répertoire, number) (f); Canticle of the Flower, ማሕሌተ፡ ጽጌ፡ (f-173v); Image of Mary, መልክአ፡ ማርያም፡, (Chaîne, Répertoire 220) (f-181v); Excerpt from the image of the Christian Sabbath [Sunday], መልክዓ፡ ሰንበተ፡ ክርስቲያን፡, in a later hand ().

origin.origDate: Composite: eighteenth century and twentieth century

revisionDesc.change: Created XML record from EMIP Collection Metadata.xsls
